CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B03

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: The Common Services Agency (more commonly known as NHS National Services Scotland) (“the Authority")

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: The Common Services Agency (more commonly known as NHS National Services Scotland) (“the Authority")
ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Gyle Square (NSS Head Office), 1 South Gyle Crescent

TITLE.P: Analgesics & Anaesthetics, Musculoskeletal & Joint Disease Generic Medicine

SHORT_DESCR.P: This framework agreement is for the supply of analgesics & Anaesthetics, Musculoskeletal & joint disease generic medicines to health Boards across NHS Scotland.
The framework agreement was awarded in the 18 Lots listed in this notice.

MAIN_SITE.P: All entities constituted pursuant to the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978, and any integrated joint boards established pursuant to New Public Bodies (joint working) Scotland Act 2014.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Supply of Baclofen Intrathecal Injections to NHS Scotland in a range of presentations. The authority intends awarding all presentations within this lot to a single supplier.

MAIN_SITE.P: All entities constituted pursuant to the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978, and any Integrated Joint Boards established pursuant to New Public Bodies (Joint Working) Scotland Act 2014.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Supply of Oxycodone Injections to NHS Scotland in a range of presentations. The Authority intends awarding all presentations within this lot to a single supplier.

TITLE.P: Lot 3 Levobupivacaine (As Hydrochloride) Sterile Wrapped Ampoules For Injection

MAIN_SITE.P: All entities constituted pursuant to the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978, and any Integrated Joint Boards established pursuant to New Public Bodies (Joint Working) Scotland Act 2014.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Supply of Levobupivacaine (As Hydrochloride) Sterile Wrapped Ampoules For Injection to NHS Scotland in a range of presentations. The Authority intends awarding all presentations within this lot to a single supplier.

TITLE.P: Lot 4 Oxycodone Hydrochloride Prolonged Release Tablets

MAIN_SITE.P: All entities constituted pursuant to the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978, and any Integrated Joint Boards established pursuant to New Public Bodies (Joint Working) Scotland Act 2014.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Supply of Oxycodone Hydrochloride Prolonged Release Tablets to NHS Scotland in a range of presentations. The Authority intends awarding each product line as a multi-supplier unranked framework agreement. It is envisaged a maximum of 6 Suppliers will be awarded.

MAIN_SITE.P: All entities constituted pursuant to the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978, and any Integrated Joint Boards established pursuant to New Public Bodies (Joint Working) Scotland Act 2014.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Supply of Fentanyl Tablets (Sublingual) to NHS Scotland in a range of presentations. The Authority intends awarding each product line as a multi-supplier unranked framework agreement. It is envisaged a maximum of 6 Suppliers will be awarded.

MAIN_SITE.P: All entities constituted pursuant to the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978, and any Integrated Joint Boards established pursuant to New Public Bodies (Joint Working) Scotland Act 2014.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Supply of Fentanyl Sf Tablets(Buccal) to NHS Scotland in a range of presentations. The Authority intends awarding each product line as a multi-supplier unranked framework agreement. It is envisaged a maximum of 6 Suppliers will be awarded.

MAIN_SITE.P: All entities constituted pursuant to the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978, and any Integrated Joint Boards established pursuant to New Public Bodies (Joint Working) Scotland Act 2014.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Supply of Fentanyl Transdermal Patch to NHS Scotland in a range of presentations. The Authority intends awarding each product line as a multi-supplier unranked framework agreement. It is envisaged a maximum of 6 Suppliers will be awarded.

MAIN_SITE.P: All entities constituted pursuant to the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978, and any Integrated Joint Boards established pursuant to New Public Bodies (Joint Working) Scotland Act 2014.

MAIN_SITE.P: All entities constituted pursuant to the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978, and any Integrated Joint Boards established pursuant to New Public Bodies (Joint Working) Scotland Act 2014.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Supply of Lidocaine Chlorhexidine Gel to NHS Scotland in a range of presentations. The Authority intends awarding each product line as a multi-supplier unranked framework agreement. It is envisaged a maximum of 6 Suppliers will be awarded.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Supply of Oxycodone Hydrochloride Capsule to NHS Scotland in a range of presentations. The Authority intends awarding each product line as a multi-supplier unranked framework agreement. It is envisaged a maximum of 6 Suppliers will be awarded.

TITLE.P: Lot 18 - All Other Analgesics & Anaesthetics, Musculoskeletal & Joint Disease Generic Medicines

MAIN_SITE.P: All entities constituted pursuant to the National Health Services (Scotland) Act 1978, and any Integrated Joint Boards established pursuant to New Public Bodies (Joint Working) Scotland Act 2014.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Supply of all other Analgesics & Anaesthetics, Musculoskeletal & Joint Disease Generic Medicine in a range of presentations. The Authority intends awarding each line within this Lot to a single supplier.

INFO_ADD.P: The estimated values referred to in Section II.I.5 and all Lots cover the 24 months contract duration and the 24 months extension period of the framework agreement.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: The Common Services Agency (more commonly known as NHS National Services Scotland) (“the Authority")
ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.ADDRESS: Gyle Square (NSS Head Office), 1 South Gyle Crescent

REVIEW_PROCEDURE.P: The bringing of court proceedings against the authority after the framework agreement has been entered into will not affect the framework agreement unless grounds for the imposition of special penalties under the Public Contracts (Scotland) Regulations 2015 can be established. Otherwise the remedies that may be awarded by the courts where the framework agreement has been entered into are limited to the award of damages.
